name: mono

variants.name: patch-folder-path
variants.description: Point SpecialFolder.CommonApplicationData folder into Spack installation instead of /usr/share

description:
Mono is a software platform designed to allow developers to easily
create cross platform applications. It is an open source implementation
of Microsoft's .NET Framework based on the ECMA standards for C# and the
Common Language Runtime.

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: iconv
dependencies.description:
GNU libiconv provides an implementation of the iconv() function and the
iconv program for character set conversion.

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependent_to.name: sbml
dependent_to.description: Library for the Systems Biology Markup Language

dependent_to.name: foundationdb
dependent_to.description:
FoundationDB is a distributed database designed to handle large volumes
of structured data across clusters of commodity servers. It organizes
data as an ordered key-value store and employs ACID transactions for all
operations.
